name: Time Tether (Morlanrith)
description:
Time Tether is a basic platformer in which you need to reach the goal before your time runs out. You can make this easier by using a special time freezing ability to stop moving platforms in their place. You need to be careful though, as using this power will cause your time to run out even faster.

This game was created as solo work over the course of around a week as part of the "Time Jam", ran by 8 Bits to Infinity.
